import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef,useCallback}from'react';import'./PomodoroTimer.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PomodoroTimer=()=>{const[workTime,setWorkTime]=useState(25*60);const[shortBreakTime,setShortBreakTime]=useState(5*60);const[longBreakTime,setLongBreakTime]=useState(15*60);const[currentTime,setCurrentTime]=useState(workTime);const[isActive,setIsActive]=useState(false);const[isPaused,setIsPaused]=useState(false);const[mode,setMode]=useState('work');// work, shortBreak, longBreak
